# snyk_project_owner (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "snyk_project_owner" "example" {
  id    = "ID of project"
  ordid = "Your ORG ID"
}
```

## Schema

- `id` (String) Project ID
- `orgid` (String) Branch to monitor
